section_id: ## 1. Modified Fisher Information and Auxiliary Functional

hints.label: def-modified-fisher
hints.title: Modified Fisher Information
hints.content:
112: :label: def-modified-fisher
113: 
114: For a parameter $\theta > 0$, the **modified Fisher information** is:
115: 
116: $$
117: I_\theta(\rho) := I_v(\rho) + \theta I_x(\rho) = \int_\Omega \rho \left(|\nabla_v \log \rho|^2 + \theta |\nabla_x \log \rho|^2\right) dx dv
118: $$
